Description: Based on factors such as your industry and profile headline.

Interested in technology media outlets, such as Venturebeat, Ted Conferneces, Wired, TechCrunch, Gizmodo, Engadget, Mashable, PCMag, Fast Company, Popular Science, The Verge, and Tech Dirt. Based on factors such as companies followed.

Members who follow Pages in the Electric Vehicle space, hashtags related to electric vehicles, or have engaged with content on electric vehicles in the last 6 months. This inference is used by advertisers (most popular with Automotive companies) on LinkedIn to target audiences more likely to be interested in Electric Vehicles.
Based on your first name and other factors.
